comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: Der Bettelstudent is an 1880s German operetta, one of whose revivals was in 1913 at New York's Casino Theatre. De Wolfe Hopper is famous for his performance of the poem "Casey at the Bat".

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: Indeed, his recitation of that American folkloric gem can be heard here: au.youtube.com/watch?v=1G2HN_1DRUo Wikipedia on the 6-times married Hopper here: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DeWolf_Hopper Hollywood gossip columnist Hedda Hopper was No. 5

comment._content: According to IBDB entry for The Beggar Student -- www.ibdb.com/production.php?id=7621 -- this would be between March 22 and April 19, 1913 Viola Gillette -- www.ibdb.com/person.php?id=42193 DeWolf Hopper -- www.ibdb.com/person.php?id=67842
